settings.title: Hi, we're Swanky Badger!
settings.content:
Welcome to your new home for gifting.

We make the most sentimental, custom gifts in the world.Laser engraved to order, andshipped fast, so youll never be left empty-handed!
Why so sentimental?

settings.title: CORPORATE GIFTS
settings.text: View our Unique Range of Branded Goods

settings.title: Make a man feel special
settings.text: Give Him The Message He Needs Most

settings.title: "So Easy, So Fast!"
settings.testimonial: I was late ordering my husband a birthday gift, but it got here in no time! Where has this been all my life?! HeLOVEDthe decanter.
settings.name: Kayla Sanchez - Dallas, TX

settings.title: "BEST GIFT EVER."
settings.testimonial: Imade a sentimental wallet for my husband, who hasn't shown emotion in literally 7 years...and he cried!
settings.name: Laurie Jackson - San Diego, CA

settings.title: "OMG, HE LOVES IT"
settings.testimonial: These product are the BOMB! I was worried about ordering the wallet because he's so picky, but he adores it!! 10/10, a million stars
settings.name: Destiny Jones - New York, NY

settings.richtext_top: Knock the Socks off your Significant Brothers with our Top Sellers!
Nothing shows true love more than a giftgiven from the heart..

settings.newsletter_text: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more

settings.content:
3,000+ FIVE-STAR REVIEWS

Read them

settings.testimonial:
13,000+ Five-Star Reviews

Read Them

settings.title: Personalization Perfected, in San Diego, CA
settings.content: Traditionally, Personalized Gifts take a long time to make and can disappoint on arrival. But we've changed the game. Masterly crafted with pace and precision, we've Perfected Personalized Gifting. Here's how...

settings.title: Order in Five Minutes
settings.text: Simply choose your gift, generate your personalization right on screen, and leave the rest up to us!

settings.title: Expertly Engraved
settings.text: Our team of creatives engrave your gift with care, ensuring it's exactly as you want it.

settings.title: Inspected by Experts
settings.text: We triple-check to ensure everything is as perfect as you deserve it to be.

settings.title: We Ship it - Fast!
settings.text: You get step-by-step tracking and receive your gift in as little as 1-3 Business Days.

settings.title: One Year Warranty
settings.text: We stand by our work, and back every product with our 1-year limited warranty.

settings.quote_text: HOW IT ALL BEGAN - The Swanky Badger Story

settings.title:
Clean up his
Shower Game
settings.subtitle: Feel Better, Smell Better. Wash with Natural Ingredients, not Harsh Chemicals

settings.title: Does He Wash Healthy?
settings.content: We've long known the benefits of eating real food over processed junk. The same applies to your skin. Ditch the big-brand chemicals. It's time to wash with natural ingredients.

settings.title: THE LAND vs. THE LAB
settings.text: Natural ingredients or lab-made chemicals? The truth behind the big-brands will astonish you.

settings.title: So, What's Actually in it?
settings.text: Glad you asked! Read all about our Natural Ingredients.

settings.title: SUBSCRIBE & SAVE 25%
settings.text: Choose your favorites, they'll ship for free, and you can cancel anytime!

settings.title: Hear what our 300,000+ Customers are saying
Who will be showering with Natural Soap?

settings.heading: Heres our Recommendation
settings.content: Most people use 2 bars per month. Hairier bodies generally use more soap. (You can change or cancel this at any time)

settings.heading: Choose Your Soaps
settings.content:
Try them all and figure out what you like most.
You can change it up with each delivery.

settings.heading: Need any Personalized Gifts?
settings.content: Our top selling gifts are perfect for any guy-gift occasions coming up.  Birthdays, anniversaries, etc.

settings.title: WHO WILL BE SHOWERING WITH NATURAL SOAP?
Giving Back
settings.text: A Portion of Every Sale Goes to Children's Hospitals
